version.prefix: create table #fixdrv ( Name sysname NOT NULL, Size bigint NOT NULL ) insert #fixdrv EXECUTE master.dbo.xp_fixeddrives update #fixdrv set Name = Name + ':'

create table #fixdrv ( Name sysname NOT NULL, Size bigint NOT NULL ) if exists (select 1 from sys.all_objects where name='dm_os_enumerate_fixed_drives' and type ='V' and is_ms_shipped = 1) begin insert #fixdrv select fixed_drive_path, free_space_in_bytes/(1024*1024) from sys.dm_os_enumerate_fixed_drives end else begin insert #fixdrv EXECUTE master.dbo.xp_fixeddrives update #fixdrv set Name = Name + ':' end
